structure.unit: Common Carriers Of Passengers By Motor Vehicle

law.catch_line: School Department Vehicles; Use For Transporting Community Groups
law.text: Notwithstanding other provisions of this chapter, the school department of a town may make vehicles under its control available to transport a community group, including, but not limited to, senior citizens, little league teams, and a town recreation group, and may charge such group for such transportation an amount sufficient to cover the cost thereof.
